headline: Leidos explosive trace detection system achieves latest EU security standard
summary: The Leidos (NYSE: LDOS) B220-HT explosive trace detection (ETD) system has achieved G1 Standard certification ahead of the European Civil Aviation Conference's (ECAC) latest regulatory mandate for all ETD systems deployed across the European Union (EU).
